events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect item.
Assigning the customer case to a refund specialist to handle the refund process.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue?
Thank you for responding. My order number is 123456, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product.
We’ve confirmed the error. I will initiate a full refund to your original payment method, and you can keep the incorrect item.
I appreciate your quick help and the refund offer; this solution works well for me, thank you!
The refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount back on your account within 3-5 business days.
We are following up to ensure you received your refund and everything is satisfactory with our resolution.
Thank you for contacting us. Your refund case has now been closed. If you need further assistance, please reach out again.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey regarding the service you received on your refund request.
